column3: [' (StepDescription: Coat -Coat a 6-oz. ramekin cup with cooking spray)']
[' (StepDescription: Pour-Pour 1 egg into the ramekin cup)']
[' (StepDescription: Microwave-Microwave the ramekin cup uncovered on high for 30 seconds)']
[' (StepDescription: Cut -Cut the English muffin into two pieces with a knife)']
[' (StepDescription: Microwave -Continue to Microwave for 15-30 more seconds or until the egg is almost set)']
[' (StepDescription: Top -Top cup with 1 tablespoon of salsa)']
[' (StepDescription: sprinkle -sprinkle 1 tablespoon of cheese on cup)']
[' (StepDescription: Line -Line the bottom piece of the English muffin with lettuce)']
[' (StepDescription: Place -Place the egg from the cup over the lettuce)']
[' (StepDescription: replace -replace the top of the English muffin)']
